title: 5/16/17 - Russia Is In The Chaos Business
description:
Why the latest President Trump/Russia story will end in subpoenas ...Did Trump give classified information to the Russians?...Dissecting what H.R. McMaster said last night ...Why is the Trump Administration refuting allegations that haven't been made? ...Bill O'Reilly to join Glenn every week?...If The Washington Post story is true, should Donald Trump still be president?...Erick Erickson of TheResurgent.com discusses his inside source on the Trump and Russia classified information story ...H.R. McMaster talks to the press.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
